subject: Pro Pedals software
description_text:
Hello,

I have the old Simsonn Pro Pedals. Could you tell me which is the latest
software that I can use? Can I use v.4 with them?

Regards,
Rossen Kovachev

conversations.body_text: Hi Росен Ковачев,  Could you please provide your order number and purchase date? I can help you verify it. You can also download different versions from our official website.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hello,

The pedals are the old Pro Pedals that a friend of mine bought long time
ago via AliExpress. I am using SimPedalsConfig v3 currently and my question
is are they compatible with both v3.5 and v4?

Regards,
Rossen Kovachev

На ср, 5.11.2025 г. в 7:37 service@simsonn.com
Hi Росен Ковачев,  If you are using the V3 version, which shows 1.7.0, it cannot be upgraded to the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, as the upgrade requires the previous version to be 1.7.1.
